full_summary:
## Government Tender Announcement

### Logistical Module for the Bell 429 Helicopter

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (613-995-8249) invites industry partners to submit proposals for the acquisition of a Logistical Module (PN: LM-1210-E-MSBHW LOGIC MODULE) for the Bell 429 helicopter. The module will be used by Transport Canada (TC) Air Services Directorate (ASD).

### Request for Proposal

A Request for Proposal (RFP) has been issued for the procurement of this logistical module under the T8493-140035 series. Eligible suppliers have been identified and invited to submit proposals. The list of invited suppliers includes:

- Aero Precision Industries LLC

### Tender Details

* Tender Closing Date: 9 January 2024 at 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 27 December 2023
* Expected Contract End Date: 31 March 2024
* Contracting Entity: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* End User Entity: Transport Canada (TC)
